title: 97/546/EC: Commission Decision of 10 July 1997 amending Decision 89/471/EEC authorizing methods for grading pig carcases in Germany (Only the German text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 10 July 1997 amending Decision 89/471/EEC authorizing methods for grading pig carcases in Germany (Only the German text is authentic) (97/546/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
In part II of the Annex to Decision 89/471/EEC the formula under point 2 is hereby replaced by the following:
'^y = 49,978 + 26,0429 >NUM>S
>DEN>F
+ 4,5154 √F - 2,5018 log S - 8,4212 √S`.
This Decision is addressed to the Federal Republic of Germany.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 July 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
